nodes.text: The IM-8005 shield projector garrison, also known as The Sharplens was a relatively new line of Imperial garrisons specializing in shielding work for large-scale orbital construction projects created by Rothana Heavy Engineering, also capable of putting down planetside uprisings from the conscripted workforce.
The IM-8005 shield projector garrison's full specifications were available only on request to Imperial officers, although it included three key features:
